response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it could be worth $12,000 to you. However, to facilitate this transaction and considering my costs and desired profit margin, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is truly worth more to you than its face value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 11000}
